distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for pam-modules fixes the following security issue:

- CVE-2011-3172: Ensure that unix2_chkpwd calls pam_acct_mgmt to prevent usage
  of locked accounts (bsc#707645).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A vulnerability in pam_modules of SUSE Linux Enterprise allows attackers to log into accounts that should have been disabled. Affected releases are SUSE Linux Enterprise: versions prior to 12.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
